review_text: The place is nice, but it lacks charging area. Water bottles aren't allowed and that makes it more annoying because if you want to drink water, you need to go back to the baggage area to get some water. But overall it's nice and cold so you might want to bring jacket or so. For now, I'll rate it 3 stars.
Definitely a good place to study, especially those who are preparing for the board exams. Bring your jackets 'cos it really gets cold inside.

Lovely American-Era architecture. The Library is just below the Cebu Provincial Museum. It is a very good place to read books about the history of Cebu and the Visayas in general. A must-see is their collection of Filipiniana books. Lovely. And it is fully airconditioned too.
Been a fan since high school

A place where in we can focus on our studies. A place where students and non-students have the freedom to mind their own businesses without anyone's judgement. The people inside serves hospitality and respect.ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ ‚Ä¶
The best library in Cebu. Being open 24 hours might make it as one of the best in the country.
Cebu City's Public Library named after the Philippines' National Hero, Dr. Jose P. Rizal. ‚Ä¶
This was a decent, small museum with a great Staff to answer questions. It's also free.

The library has undergone a lot of improvements in recent years thanks to the efforts of concerned citizens who have taken up its cause. It's great that it's now open for 24 hours so students and even professionals can drop by to enjoy the quiet while studying or preparing for activities.
Beautiful building with a neoclassical design. A must visit for every tourist in Cebu.
Great place to study. But I hope they can extend their service hours to the public.

This is a great free place for studying, doing your homework, or other educational purposes :) instead of going to caf√©s having this public library is really a decent place to replace em 200php coffees. They also have old books there for ‚Ä¶

This is the first library in the Philippines to be open 24 hours. Students may stay here to study, research, and read books. There is also a Children's corner where they can read fun books. Also, the library conduct story tellings for the ‚Ä¶

I just walked in the library and in my opinion this is one of those busy libraries where students really make use of the resources. They have a painting on the wall where a 'mi ultimo adios' is written in Cebuano. There's also free drinking ‚Ä¶

Newly refurbished grand hall. A very historical place.  Very nice classical look, with ballroom that has a capacity of maybe about 300 pax.  The bathroom facilities are horrendous though  and the place has no elevators.  Parking is very limited inside the grounds and parking fees are very expensive in the areas around.
Good for studying. Can't bring your bag with you on the table, though. And no lockers. Def need improvment, but its in progress. So its cool and free.
Great place to study! But the AC is too hot since I started coming to the library, for 5 months now.
The library staff are very accomodating and the library is well air-conditioned you could really focus on studying or reading.
Good place to study/work in. Staff members are friendly and accommodating. It just needs a little more space.
The best place in Cebu to find rare and very interesting books
The Rizal Library has a great potential to become a real cultural destination not only for tourist but also for the locals. At the moment it is not that and a bit unmaintained well.
Tables are placed really close to each other. No centralized airconditioner. Has a dress code.
Great place to study. They're now 24 hours open and with free wifi.
Though the space is small, you can find several bestsellers amd classics here. There are also very helpful reference materials here especially the Filipiniana section.
It's open 24/7 and provides a relaxed and quiet environment for people to study or research.
Oct 2020 - Beautiful Building.   Was closed on the day we walked by!  Next trip!  (Feb 21)
too crowded. not updated books. but provides basic library space for studying.
24 hrs service with free wifi easy accessible good for students
Great place to study anf is open 24-7. Awesome!
Lots of books for reference doing my thesis best place to do research and study for the board exam
A great place for those students who wants a quiet place to study.
This building is now always open to serve its patrons. Slippers, shorts and sando shirts are not allowed.
Great place for studying. The place was clean and the people are approachable.
The staffs are the one who are noisy especially if there are only few people researching and studying.
Great acoustics although the place has to be renovated.

No entrance Fee and Free Wifi.
24/7 operation and Air-conditioned
It's the Philippine's FIRST public library operating 24/7.
I feel the momentum of my study in this place, organized and improving.
I appreciate they hold special events to highlight local talents.
Good for research and study. Just wow! Open 24/7
Good hospitality librarian n other employees..
This is an excellent place for solo and group study.
It is a public library that opens 24 hours.
Big function room, perfect for parties
